data.text: @MinofHealthUG Have you now stopped publishing daily figures?
@DanielEdonu @MinofHealthUG Stay away from those harmful jabs before you become another death statistic. https://t.co/no5rSj58wp

@MinofHealthUG Guys what I went through at Mutukula border is just business and not Covid. The manner through which officers regardless' are soliciting for bribes under the disguise of Covid-19 is a BIG SHAME to whoever is preaching it. Can't say a lot.
